title: Investigate messaging (kafka, AMQP, MQTT) with virtual threads

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description

This work is mostly about adding virtual thread support to reactive messaging and analyze:

- the resulting development model (and what can be improved)
- the limitations (typically, make sure we don't OOM)

The idea would be to add `@RunOnVirtualThread` support to reactive messaging methods.

### Analysis
(links to analysis docs containing architecture design work, requirements gathering, etc)
